org.resthub.common.service

Interface CrudService<T,ID extends Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Your resource POJO to manage, maybe an entity or DTO class
    ID - Resource id type, usually Long or String
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CrudServiceImpl

    public interface CrudService<T,ID extends Serializable>
    Crud Service interface.

        void deleteAll()
